summary: THE ABS LIGHT CAME ON WHILE DRIVING.  WHEN VEHICLE WAS SHUT OFF, THE ABS UNIT CONTINUED TO RUN.  PULLED THE 60 AMP FUSE AND THE UNIT SHUT OFF.  CONTINUED TO DRIVE VEHICLE WITHOUT THE FUSE.  BEEN DRIVING IT THIS WAY FOR ABOUT A MONTH.  BRAKES ARE NOW WORN.  DO NOT RELISH SPENDING $1000+ TO REPAIR A 4 YEAR OLD TRUCK WITH LOW MILEAGE!!  *NLM
